Weird.......... strange thing about doodle
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher Advance 2 Archive (GameBoy Advance): Miscellaneous Q&A (Post New Questions Here): Weird.......... strange thing about doodle
By Fyrerazer on Thursday, June 17, 2004 - 08:37 pm:

I'm not sure about all doodles (like there are that many), but pure doodles do something weird. when u go to AGIMAand select coach/contract then press the b button, a piece of doodle will show up. you will need a quick eye,as it is only there for the split second between the coach in the box and the desk. this may have been noticed before and posted, but i haven't seen it as of yet.

By Fyrerazer on Thursday, June 17, 2004 - 08:38 pm:

Oh i also know this trick doesn't work with jokers...... it may be just doodle. its just sumthing funny the programmers did.
